oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo's brother was murdered because he stayed away from his wife and children and did not feed them. ||kabbo's sister-in-law later died of an 'internal sickness'. Her surviving sister took the orphaned child to ||kabbo, who raised her as his own child. ||kabbo journeyed to fetch the orphan from the dead woman's sick sister and met her halfway, as they lived far apart. 1) This story is found in Book II-32.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The death of ||kabbo's brother and sister-in-law
